module.title: adjectives
module.p: Adjectives are words which typically refer to intangible properties and states.
Adjectives can be divided into two morphological classes –

ul.li: Derived adjectives are understood as having been formed from other adjectives, nouns or verbs eg. Frangach French, ceòlmhor melodious.
Simple adjectives are not understood as having been derived from other words eg. mòr big, geal white.
